sentences.en: ...the overall rise in unemployment.
sentences.cn: …失业人数的总体上升。

sentences.en: a huge 101-seat overall majority
sentences.cn: 多出达101个席位的绝对优势

sentences.en: According to the survey, overall world trade has also slackened.
sentences.cn: 根据这项调查，世界贸易整体上也有所放慢。

sentences.en: An overall winner and a runner-up were chosen.
sentences.cn: 总冠军和第二名被选了出来。

sentences.en: His overall condition remained fragile.
sentences.cn: 他的整体情况还是很不稳定。

sentences.en: Overall I was disappointed.
sentences.cn: 总的说来,我很失望.

sentences.en: Overall industrial production was up compared with last year.
sentences.cn: 与去年相比,整个工业产值上升了很多.

sentences.en: Overall, barter is a very inefficient means of organizing transactions.
sentences.cn: 总之，易货贸易是一种效率很低的交易形式。

sentences.en: Overall, I like Connie. I think she's great.
sentences.cn: 总的说来,我喜欢康妮,我认为她人挺不错.

sentences.en: Overall, there were more losers than gainers.
sentences.cn: 总的来看，输家比赢家多。

sentences.en: The college has few ways to assess the quality of education overall.
sentences.cn: 总体看来,这所大学评估教育质量的方法寥寥无几.

sentences.en: The overall ambience of the room is cosy.
sentences.cn: 房间整体的感觉是温暖舒适。

sentences.en: The overall cost of the exhibition was £400,000.
sentences.cn: 展览会的全部费用是40万英镑。

sentences.en: The overall effect is enchanting.
sentences.cn: 整体效果赏心悦目。

sentences.en: The overall mood of the meeting was downbeat.
sentences.cn: 整个会场的气氛是沉闷的。

sentences.en: The overall result is an increase in population.
sentences.cn: 总的结果是人口增加。

sentences.en: the person with overall responsibility for the project
sentences.cn: 全面负责本项目的人

sentences.en: The shop assistant was wearing a white overall.
sentences.cn: 那店员穿着白色长罩衣.

sentences.en: We did an overall consideration of the matter at last.
sentences.cn: 最后我们又对这个问题作了全盘考虑.

sentences.en: We don’t want all the details now, just the overall picture.
sentences.cn: 现在我们不需要全部细节，只要知道大致的情况。

sentences.en: What will it cost, overall?
sentences.cn: 这总共要花多少钱？

sentences.en: Williams came fifth overall.
sentences.cn: 威廉斯的总排名是第五。

words.tran_cn: 压住；否定；专横地对待；繁殖过度（overbear的ing形式）
全部的；全体的；一切在内的

phrases.tran_cn: 整个项目；全面计划方案

trans.tran_en: a loose-fitting piece of clothing like a coat, that is worn over clothes to protect them
